Row.Text: Enter the Patricios!

Dear leader, a band of soldiers approached us, seemingly willing to join our revolutionary efforts. They call themselves the “Patricios”, and are a group of voluntary men who joined against the English for the Viceroyalty. They swear their allegiance with the Viceroyalty has diminished, and their primary goal is to defend Buenos Aires. We have lost troops to them, so we must be careful with them. They gathered at the “Plaza de la Victoria” awaiting for our decision.[NEWLINE]
Allow them to join our cause freely.

Boca vs River!

Our citizens are in joy for a new epic match in the history of Soccer. Our two major teams, Boca and River will play at {1_CityName}’s Stadium! People rejoice in excitement and are ready for a match that shall change the course of Soccer for ever! [NEWLINE]
¡Viva!

Logia Lautaro

A letter from Francisco de Miranda:[NEWLINE] “José de San Martín, it’s always a pleasure to send some words to you. As you know, we have been battling the Spanish Empire for our freedom for quite a while now. We must not remain fighting alone in this effort. I have sent this letter to you, Bolivar and O’Higgins, aside from some other fellow libertadores, with the hope we can join our forces together in a secret order to remove the Colonial powers from our lands; they have all accepted. As you once suggested, we can name it the “Logia Lautaro”. I hope we can join forces together, and I will be awaiting your answer.”[NEWLINE]
Found the Order

The Logia Lautaro will help us in war and politics, but smaller states will feel less confident around us.[NEWLINE] [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Resting point with Cit-States will be reduced by 10.[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Military Unit production will increase by 15%.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Receive a free Social Policy.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]
Rumor says San Martín founded the Logia Lautaro!
Dismiss
